title: 5-Minute Avocado Toast
description: Quick and healthy breakfast with just 3 ingredients
instructions: Toast the bread slices until golden brown
Mash the avocado with a fork
Spread avocado on toast and season with salt and pepper

title: One-Pan Chicken & Vegetables
description: Complete meal with protein and veggies in 30 minutes
ingredients: 2 cups mixed vegetables (broccoli, carrots, bell peppers)
instructions: Preheat oven to 400°F (200°C)
Season chicken with salt, pepper, and Italian seasoning
Heat olive oil in oven-safe pan and sear chicken for 3-4 minutes each side
Add vegetables and garlic around chicken
Bake for 20-25 minutes until chicken reaches internal temperature of 165°F

title: Leftover Rice Fried Rice
description: Transform yesterday's rice into tonight's dinner
instructions: Heat oil in large pan or wok over high heat
Add beaten eggs and scramble, then remove and set aside
Add rice to pan and stir-fry for 2-3 minutes
Add vegetables and cook for 2 minutes
Return eggs to pan, add soy sauce and sesame oil
Stir everything together and garnish with green onions

title: Mediterranean Quinoa Bowl
description: Healthy and filling bowl with fresh Mediterranean flavors
instructions: Cook quinoa according to package directions and let cool
Prepare all vegetables and herbs
Whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, oregano, salt, and pepper
Combine quinoa with vegetables in large bowl
Drizzle with dressing and toss to combine
Let sit for 10 minutes before serving to allow flavors to meld

title: Quick Pasta Aglio e Olio
description: Italian classic with just 5 ingredients in 15 minutes
instructions: Cook pasta according to package directions until al dente
While pasta cooks, heat olive oil in large pan over medium heat
Add garlic and red pepper flakes, cook until garlic is golden
Reserve 1/2 cup pasta water before draining
Add drained pasta to pan with garlic oil
Toss with pasta water and parsley, serve with Parmesan

title: Overnight Oats Berry Parfait
description: Prep-ahead breakfast ready when you wake up
instructions: Mix oats, milk, honey, chia seeds, and vanilla in bowl
Divide mixture between two jars or containers
Layer with yogurt and berries
Refrigerate overnight or at least 4 hours
Enjoy cold straight from the fridge
